description: Grupo Chiavassa, a family-owned dairy business in Santa Fe, Argentina, has been dedicated to sustainable milk and pork production for over a century. Celebrating its 100th anniversary, the group focuses on adding value through a circular economy model, integrating advanced technology to enhance efficiency and employment in the region. With plans to double milk production and a commitment to animal welfare, Grupo Chiavassa aims to provide high-quality products while caring for the environment.
name: Grupo Chiavassa
